data.message: Implement 3D card hover effects for Intersphere: Added perspective-container and card-3d CSS classes to globals.css. Enhanced EditorialCard with Framer Motion 3D rotateX/rotateY on hover. Applied card-3d-subtle to homepage feature cards and Everything Connects section. Build passing.
data.task: Implement 3D card hover effects for Intersphere
data.outcome: Added perspective-container and card-3d CSS classes to globals.css. Enhanced EditorialCard with Framer Motion 3D rotateX/rotateY on hover. Applied card-3d-subtle to homepage feature cards and Everything Connects section. Build passing.
